subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: With his fame in tow Saturday, Roger Clemens didn’t arrive as a savior. He simply stood as a replica of the Yankees’ past, of the championless time span right before and after he left four years ago.
snippet: With his fame in tow Saturday, Roger Clemens didn’t arrive as a savior. He simply stood as a replica of the Yankees’ past, of the championless time span right before and after he left four years ago.
